intro.content: When you play {{- game}}, you also get {{count}} participation in the SUPER JACKPOT game. This gives you {{count}} chance to win the SUPER JACKPOT when you click the "PLAY {{price}}" button. By playing {{- game}} you acknowledge the terms of this game.

superjackpot.looserSuperjackpot: You didn't win, better luck next time.
